'''''Vinyar Tengwar 21''''' is the twenty-first issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|20|22}}

==Contents==
* Cover: The Tolkien Centenary Seal
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "''Sí man i·yulmar n(g)win enquatuva'': A Newly-Discovered ''Tengwar'' Inscription"✫ — Carl F. Hostetter
* "''Quettarë Kalyaina Eldalamberon'': Illuminated Quenya Word-list" — Lisa Star
* "Overcounting" — Bill Welden
* "Words and Devices: Still at Large There Were Giants, Part 1" (column) — Patrick H. Wynne and Carl F. Hostetter
* "Transitions in Translations: Tolkien on Translation" (column) — Arden R. Smith

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
